title: A Survey on the Cybersecurity of IoT From The Perspective of SoC
abstract: Internet of Things is permeating every aspects of our society. Concerning critical infrastructures, people’s privacy and the availability of IoT services, assessed with the standard Confidentiality-Integrity-Availability triad model, we investigate the cybersecurity of IoT from the perspective of System on Chip - the core physical components of IoT. The cybersecurity of IoT has been improved drastically in the recent decade, especially in the core of IoT - the System on Chip, most of them integrated hardware security modules for cybersecurity. However, it is still a challenge to design, run and maintain a secure IoT system.
venue: 2023 10th International Conference on Internet of Things: Systems, Management and Security (IOTSMS)
